Sentencas: This paper is concerned with predictive control of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) based on a benchmark model commonly studied in the dynamic SOFC modeling/control literature.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It has been shown in previous studies that control of SOFC is challenging owing to the slow response and tight operating constraints.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, we apply a data-driven predictive control approach to solving the control problem of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The predictive control applied is completely data based.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, unlike other data-driven predictive control designs, the proposed approach can deal with systems without complete on-line measurement of all output variables.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simulation results have demonstrated the feasibility of the control application.
Titulo: Data-driven predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells
